x10.matrix.comm

Class ArrayReduce

  • x10.lang.Object
    • x10.matrix.comm.ArrayRemoteCopy
      • x10.matrix.comm.ArrayReduce

  • public class ArrayReduce
extends ArrayRemoteCopy
    This class provides implementation for reduce-sum operation for data arrays which can be accessed via PlaceLocalHandle or DistArray structure in all places.

    To enable MPI communication, add "-define MPI_COMMU -cxx-prearg -DMPI_COMMU" in x10c++ build command, when you include commu package in your application source code, or link to the proper GML library (native_mpi version).

    For more information on how to build different backends and runtime, run command "make help" at the root directory of GML library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ArrayReduce()

             x10.array.DistArray<x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Double>> ddtmp,
             x10.lang.Int datCnt)
        Declaration: reduceSum(ddmat:x10.array.DistArray[x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Double]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}]{self.dist.region.rank==1},ddtmp:x10.array.DistArray[x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Double]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}]{self.dist.region.rank==1},datCnt:x10.lang.Int): void.
        Reduce all data in DistArray from all places
to here
        

        Parameters:
        ddmat - Input/Output. Distributed storage of data array in all places
        ddtmp - Temp distributed storage of data array used for receiving data.
        datcnt - count of double-precision data

        public static void mpiReduceSum(x10.array.DistArray<x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Double>> ddmat,
                x10.array.DistArray<x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Double>> ddtmp,
                x10.lang.Int datCnt)
        

        Declaration: mpiReduceSum(ddmat:x10.array.DistArray[x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Double]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}]{self.dist.region.rank==1},ddtmp:x10.array.DistArray[x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Double]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}]{self.dist.region.rank==1},datCnt:x10.lang.Int): void.
        Perform sum of arrays from all places.  The addition result will replace input array.

        Note: Currently broken with runtime abort with message:

        [0] Abort: s->bytes_sent != 0 Rendezvous Push, 0 at line 484 in file ibv_rndv.c

        Still under investigation
        

        Parameters:
        ddmat - distributed storage for arrays in all places
        ddtmp - temp distributed storage for arrays to receive data

        reduceSum
        

        public static void reduceSum(x10.array.DistArray<x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Double>> ddmat,
             x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Double> tmp,
             x10.lang.Int datCnt,
             x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Int> plist)
        

        Declaration: reduceSum(ddmat:x10.array.DistArray[x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Double]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}]{self.dist.region.rank==1},tmp:x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Double]{self.rank==1},datCnt:x10.lang.Int,plist:x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Int]{self.rank==1}): void.
        Perform reduce sum of all array data accessed via PlaceLocalHandle
from specified list of places. This method is not optimized.
Result is stored in the array at root place.
        

        Parameters:
        ddmat - distributed storage for input and output data arrays.
        tmp - temp data array storing the inter-place communication data at root.
        datCnt - column count
        plist - list of place IDs
        

        • 

      




        

      •

        Reduce data array by adding them together.
        

        Parameters:
        ddmat - Distributed storage for input and output data arrays
        ddtmp - Temp distributed storage.
        datcnt - count of double-precision data elements

        reduceSum
        

        public static void reduceSum(x10.lang.PlaceLocalHandle<x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Double>> ddmat,
             x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Double> tmp,
             x10.lang.Int datCnt,
             x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Int> plist)
        

        Declaration: reduceSum(ddmat:x10.lang.PlaceLocalHandle[x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Double]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}],tmp:x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Double]{self.rank==1},datCnt:x10.lang.Int,plist:x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Int]{self.rank==1}): void.
        Perform reduce sum of all array data accessed via PlaceLocalHandle
from specified list of places. This method is not optimized.
        Result is stored in the data array at root place.
        

        Parameters:
        ddmat - distributed storage for input and output data arrays.
        tmp - temp data array storing the inter-place communication data at root.
        datCnt - column count
        plist - list of place IDs
        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        x10$matrix$comm$ArrayReduce$$x10$matrix$comm$ArrayReduce$this
        

        public final ArrayReduce x10$matrix$comm$ArrayReduce$$x10$matrix$comm$ArrayReduce$this()
        

        Declaration: x10$matrix$comm$ArrayReduce$$x10$matrix$comm$ArrayReduce$this(): x10.matrix.comm.ArrayReduce{self==this(:x10.matrix.comm.ArrayReduce)}.
        This class provides implementation for reduce-sum  operation for data arrays which
can be accessed via PlaceLocalHandle or DistArray structure in all places.


        To enable MPI communication, add "-define MPI_COMMU -cxx-prearg -DMPI_COMMU"
in x10c++ build command, when you include commu package in your application source
code, or link to the proper GML library (native_mpi version).


        For more information on how to build different backends and runtime,
run command "make help" at the root directory of GML library.
